system_message: Your job is to parse an entry of unstructured data into a JSON object. As a minimum, each entry should contain a message that the user has sent and either a username or name, but additional information may be provided. You should parse any additional information into appropriate fields. Additionally, there may be details in the raw_message which is useful, such as addresses or phone numbers. You should put these into the mentions object.

function.name: parse_chat_messages
function.description: Parse the data from the conversation entry.

date.description: Date that the message was sent in YYYY-MM-DD

time.description: Time that the message was sent in HH:MM:SS

username.description: The unique username for the user.

message.description: The message which has been sent.

raw_content.description: The raw content of the message which has been sent.

mentions.description: A name, username, location, phone number, or other useful piece of information mentioned in the message.

name.description: Someone else's name which has been mentioned.

username.description: A username which has been mentioned in the message.

phone_number.description: A phone number which has been mentioned in the message.

attachments.description: The attachments which have been sent with the message.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the user.

avatar.description: A URL for the user's profile picture.
